unnormalised: Oh ho! Cart abandonment, eh? Did Sharmaji’s online store give you the "meh"? Maybe the delivery to Jodhpur was too steep? Rs. 50 extra! Happens to the best of us. Remember Auntiji’s bargaining at the Janpath market on 26/01? Savage. Check your wifi, maybe? Or blame it on Mercury retrograde, like my astrologer suggested on 14/04/2024 at 11:11 PM. Go back, add that saree. Don't let Lakshmi *ji* frown.
normalised: Oh ho! Cart abandonment, eh? Did Sharmaji’s online store give you the "meh"? Maybe the delivery to Jodhpur was too steep? Rupee fifty extra! Happens to the best of us.
